title: Emerald and Diamond Pearl Cascade Haaram - 'Manoharam'
materials: South Sea Pearls (29.43 carats). Hyderabadi Polish finish for enhanced luster.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. Features a central row of oval-cut emeralds surrounded by a halo of dazzling diamonds. Delicate diamond-studded motifs cascade downwards, each adorned with a lustrous South Sea pearl. The setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship, with each stone meticulously placed for maximum brilliance and security. The gold is crafted with a subtle filigree design, adding a touch of traditional elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
and creamy ivory pearls. A classic and timeless South Indian color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies like muhurtham and modern cocktail parties.
description: This 'Manoharam' Haaram is a fusion of traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The rare combination of emeralds, diamonds, and South Sea pearls creates a piece that is both luxurious and versatile. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's radiance, making it a truly eye-catching heirloom piece. The emeralds are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, adding symbolic value to this exquisite necklace.
